short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count emoji in YouTube Live chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Count the number of emojis commented on YouTubeLiveChat.
The counted number is output to the greenback window, and you can check how many emojis have been posted to the distribution.
Let's liven up the distribution with lots of emoji.
